pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.1.6: For the method of making a santhata, see Appendix of Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.11: It is called the first rule since it is the first rule of the second chapter of nissaggiya pācittiyas for bhikkhus. If, however, one disregards the division into chapters, it is the eleventh rule of the nissaggiya pācittiyas.
